# Basics

::: {.cheat title="Maxwell"}
$$
\nabla \times \mathbf{E} + i\omega \mathbf{B}  = \mathbf{0}
$$
$$
\nabla \times \mathbf{H} - i\omega \mathbf{D}  = \mathbf{j}
$$
$$
\nabla \cdot \mathbf{B} = 0
$$
$$
\nabla \cdot \mathbf{D} = \rho_E
$$
:::
